message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this valuable product for a limited time. I think it would be perfect for you. I'm asking for $180. What do you think?
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Would it be possible to negotiate the price down to $150?
Hi Bob, I understand your budget concerns. How about we meet in the middle at $165? This is a very competitive price for a product of this quality.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to propose a price of $155 for the product. I hope this aligns better with my budget.
